title: Every Child Is Brilliant
description: It all starts with the fundamental belief that every child is brilliant in ways that transcend getting right answers quickly. When we see the whole child, we begin to unlock their full potential!

title: Spark Curiosity
description: Most classes skip right to teaching a new concept BEFORE students are curious. This is a recipe for boredom and kids asking "when am I ever going to use this?" All good learning arises from curiosity!

title: Math is an Adventure
description: Learn to create experiences that invite students to tackle challenging problems and learn through experience. Get out of the way and let students show you what they are capable of!
